title: What’s your décor aesthetic? Take this quiz as a couple!
text:
Mostly Cs: MODERN

A reflection of the modern art movement, this style stays away from bold and catchy decor pieces and relies on simple and functional decor pieces. Clean and well-defined shapes are the focal points in homes inspired by this theme.

Mostly Ds: BOHEMIAN

Bring in pieces that have their own story to tell. Fill up the space with the vibrant colours. Get in touch with nature by adding a bunch of potted plants. Adorn your house with your favourite pieces, no matter how eccentric they are!



Text: Sanika Tamhane
description: Moving into a new home post-wedding, and need to do it up before? First, find out the décor aesthetic as a couple! Take this quiz.
